trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_DWARFMASTER03671_000_001<tab>Lali-doubtless you've already guessed-ho, but another recording device has arrived from Konogg. Here.
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_DWARFMASTER03671_000_002<tab>Far as I can tell, he's sending them at regular intervals. What could the boy be up to?
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_GLAGG_000_003<tab>Hmph, I could ask you the same. What devious scheme are you plottin'?
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_GLAGG_000_004<tab>Well, whatever it is, you won't succeed! This is my village, and I'm not lettin' you have your way with it!
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_GLAGG_000_005<tab>...Huh? Why did I say that? Why did I feel so angry? F-Forget I said anything...
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_DWARFMASTER03671_000_006<tab>As you can see, Glagg's still behaving strangely.

TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_DWARFMASTER03671_000_007<tab>When I tried talking to him earlier, he all but told me to bugger off. On the face of it, you'd assume he takes exception to what I did at the meeting, but this is a little <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> strange...
TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_DWARFMASTER03671_000_008<tab>At any rate, this is my problem to deal with, not yours. You just focus on doing your part for the cause, eh?

TEXT_LUCKTA513_04046_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>The message can be viewed in your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Portable Archive<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which is available under Collection in the Duty section of the main menu.
